name: Killer in Overdrive!
description:
This game was created in 3h!!!!

Use A/D or and SPACE to run from the killer.

You goal is to get to the safe house at the end of the level.

The killer runs slower than you just by a small margin, so a perfect run is needed to succeed!

All the code and assets are available on github: https://github.com/janisskuja/killer_in_overdrive

Credits
Sounds taken from:
"Badass Victory" - https://freesound.org/people/PearceWilsonKing/sounds/249524/
"Short Metal Loop" - https://freesound.org/people/furbyguy/sounds/331872/
"Comical Screams" - https://freesound.org/people/Mafon2/sounds/343490/
Font
